name: channel_left
long_desc: My Slack API Start here App features Messagingnew Reference Slack App Directory Authentication Keep in touch Resources Community You left a channel Compatibility: RTM Events API The channel_left event is sometimes sent to all connections for a user when that user leaves a channel. It is sometimes withheld. Clients should respond to this message by closing the channel — this means that when a channel is left from client A, it will automatically be closed in client B. In addition to this message, all existing members of the channel will receive a channel_leave message event.
